lead_paragraph: Dejan Lovren has abruptly ruled himself out of Croatia's World Cup qualifier against Iceland and a friendly with Northern Ireland this month, the Liverpool defender said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Croatia's Lovren Pulls Out of Iceland World Cup Qualifier
headline.main: Croatia's Lovren Pulls Out of Iceland World Cup Qualifier

snippet: Dejan Lovren has abruptly ruled himself out of Croatia's World Cup qualifier against Iceland and a friendly with Northern Ireland this month, the Liverpool defender said on Friday....
